title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 383.3 - Grantee responsibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 383.3 - Grantee responsibility

State Regulations
(a) Repealed
(b) Each appropriate grantee must receive an
initial payment access card at no charge to the grantee. When a recipient
claims that his or her payment access card, which is required to access
benefits through electronic issuance systems, has been lost, stolen or
destroyed, or that the security features of the card have been compromised, the
social services district must provide the recipient with a replacement payment
access card within 48 hours, exclusive of holidays and weekends, once the
recipient has complied with the social services district's identification
verification requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
383.3

Amended

New

York State Register June 9, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 23, eff. 6/9/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
